\documentclass[dvipsnames]{standalone}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{tikz, tikz-qtree}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{inconsolata}

\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[
  font=\tt,
  edge from parent/.append style={->,>=latex,Gray},
  every tree node/.style={minimum width=3ex,minimum height=3ex,inner sep=1pt,semithick},
  call/.style={rectangle,fill=BurntOrange,minimum width=2ex,minimum height=2ex},
  sym/.style={rectangle,rounded corners=.5ex,draw=Plum},
  lit/.style={rectangle,draw}
  ]
  <TREE_STRING>
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
